content: The 11th edition of the Future of Education International Conference will take place in Florence, Italy, on 1-2 July 2021\. The objective of the Conference is to promote transnational cooperation and share good practice in the field of education. The Conference is also an excellent opportunity for the presentation of previous and current education projects and initiatives. The Call for Papers is addressed to teachers, researchers and experts in the field of education as well as to coordinators of teaching and training projects. Experts in the field of education are therefore invited to submit an abstract of a paper to be presented in the conference. Important dates: 10 March 2021: Abstract submission deadline 22 March 2021: Notification of abstract evaluation 9 May 2021 : Paper submission deadline There will be three presentation modalities: oral, poster and virtual presentations. All accepted papers will be included in the Conference Proceedings published with ISBN, ISSN, DOI and ISPN codes. The publication will be sent to be reviewed for inclusion in the Conference Proceedings Citation Index by Thomson Reuters (ISI-Clarivate). The publication will also be included in Academia and indexed in Google Scholar.
